name: 34788NI
description: Premier R-134A refrigerant recovery, recycling, and recharging machine.

name: 34888HD
description: Advanced R134A Heavy-Duty Recover, Recycle, Recharge Machine

name: AC1234-4-SL
description: Premier R-1234yf Recover, Recycle and Recharge Machine for Mobile Service.

name: Oil Injector R-134A
description: Use this syringe-type injector to add oil to a fully pressurized A/C system.

name: Vinyl Dust Cover
description: Protect your investment with a heavy-duty vinyl dust cover. Fits 34900, 34800-2K, and 17800B Series.

name: Vehicle Database
description: Confirm A/C system charge capacities directly from your Robinair A/C RRR machine for R-134a systems. Includes charge amounts and component oil capacities for vehicle model years 1997-2020 using R-134a refrigerant.

name: Printer Paper (3-pack)
description: 3 rolls of printer paper to suit the 30038 optional printer used with the 34788NI and 34788NI-H RRR machines.
